features: These exquisite earrings feature a stylized floral design at the top, cascading into a graceful arrangement of baguette-cut stones. The petals of the floral blooms are set with pink stones and surrounded by sparkling White Zirconia. The dangling arrangement of leaves is accentuated with more zirconia and a mix of colourful baguette cut stones, which adds a touch of modernity and playfulness to the design.
occasions: or adding a touch of glamour to your everyday style. These earrings are a modern take on traditional styles
suitable for both Indian and Western outfits.
description: These earrings offer a unique blend of contemporary design and colourful glamour. The meticulous craftsmanship and vibrant gemstones make them a standout piece that will elevate any look. Experience the luxury and charm of Hyderabad jewelry with this timeless treasure.
